com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.internal

Class CommonMapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.internal.CommonMapController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PacketListener, org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class CommonMapController
extends java.lang.Object
implements PacketListener, org.bukkit.event.Listener

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CommonMapController.CachedMapItemCleaner
      Removes map items from the cache when they have been in there for too long
      class  CommonMapController.FramedMapUpdater
      Updates the players viewing item frames and fires events for them
      class  CommonMapController.HeldMapUpdater
      Continuously checks if a map item is being held by a player
      class  CommonMapController.ItemFrameInfo
      Maintains metadata information for a single item frame
      class  CommonMapController.ItemMapIdUpdater 
      class  CommonMapController.MapDisplayInfo
      Maintains the metadata information for a map
      class  CommonMapController.MapInputUpdater
      Refreshes the input state of maps every tick, when input is intercepted
      class  CommonMapController.ViewStack
      Maintains a list of past Map Displays that will be shown in order as sessions end.

      • getInfo

        public CommonMapController.MapDisplayInfo getInfo(org.bukkit.entity.ItemFrame itemFrame)
        Gets the Map display information for a map item displayed in an item frame. All frames showing the same map will return the same #MapDisplayInfo. If the item frame does not show a map, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        itemFrame - to get the map information for
        Returns:
        map display info

      • getInfo

        public CommonMapController.MapDisplayInfo getInfo(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack mapItem)
        Gets the Map display information for a certain map item. All items showing the same map will return the same #MapDisplayInfo. If the item does not represent a map, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        mapItem - to get the map information for
        Returns:
        map display info

        Returns:

      • updateMapItem

        public void updateMapItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack oldItem,
                          org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack newItem)
        Updates the information of a map item, refreshing all item frames and player inventories storing the item. Map displays are also updated.
        Parameters:
        oldItem - that was changed
        newItem - the old item was changed into

      • handleItemSync

        public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack handleItemSync(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item,
                                                     int tileX,
                                                     int tileY)
        Adjusts the internal remapping from UUID to Map Id taking into account the new item being synchronized to the player. If the item is that of a virtual map, the map Id of the item is updated. NBT data that should not be synchronized is dropped.
        Parameters:
        item -
        tileX - the X-coordinate of the tile in which the item is displayed
        tileY - the Y-coordinate of the tile in which the item is displayed
        Returns:
        True if the item was changed and needs to be updated in the packet

        Obtains the Map Id used for displaying a particular map UUID
        Parameters:
        mapUUID - to be displayed
        Returns:
        map Id

      • getItemFrameItem

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getItemFrameItem(org.bukkit.entity.ItemFrame itemFrame)
        Gets the Item displayed in an ItemFrame. Bukkit discards NBT Metadata, which is pretty annoying. Always use this method instead.
        Parameters:
        itemFrame - to get the item from
        Returns:
        item displayed, null if empty

        Parameters:
        itemFrame - to set the item for
        item - to set

        Returns:
